did.abstract: The collection includes two pamphlets: an annual report of the Commissioner of the Fire Department of the City of Brooklyn, 1884; and "The Fire Limits of the City of Brooklyn, WD," 1869. The latter pamphlet concerns the establishment of official building and property inspection and fire prevention practices and policies in the City of Brooklyn.
